q: Eric Schmidt , who previously had been Novell CEO and Sun CTO, has been the public face of Google with his calm, relaxed demeanor, while running the company as a "triumvirate" with Page and Sergey Brin . Having Eric Schmidt as the front of Google has been tremendous for Google, and there is no doubt that bringing his perspective has been critical for good decision-making at the company, IDC analyst Al Hilwa said via e-mail. Some wondered if Page is up to the mammoth task of running such a large, powerful and increasingly diverse company. "I guess the question is whether being Google CEO

Maybe if we give him a third term he'll get it right." Returning the compliment, Donald Rumsfeld pointed out that it was still not too late for Dick Cheney to run for president in 2012. There's probably still time for you to file some paperwork for Iowa and New Hampshire. Donald Rumsfeld 's re-emergence has come at a time when events in Egypt have laid bare the fault line between idealism and realism in American foreign policy that also existed in the President Bush era. coupons statement Thursday, Google's Eric Schmidt , announced that he will hand over the title of chief executive to Google co-founder Larry Page in April. In a message sent out on Twitter, Eric Schmidt said: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed! "His impromptu... his decision to take off and go without the hesitation is big," said Bears offensive coordinator Mike Martz of Jay Cutler . He makes plays with his feet. I haven't had a quarterback like that before. "He's made some really big plays for us. He's kept us in games and got us in position to score. Last week we had a couple plays for him in the game plan that we actually designed to run in the playoffs. He is clearly someone who could carry on the remarkable success of Mitch Daniels , Dan Coats says. "I am going to strongly encourage him to run. I know he's going to take a little time to assess it, but I hope he's our next governor."

Tonight host Mary Hart now has another title, godmother of Oceania Cruises? new cruise ship Marina! Mary Hart was chosen to christen the ship in Miami, Florida over the weekend, saying of the opportunity, It?s very exciting, and a bit humbling....
